name: Skelevasion
description:
Skelevasion

You have been announced as a skeleton king. That's great! But now the hideous humans want to kill you - So you grab your gold and hire your fellow skeletons to fight them off!

With 5 difficulties and a rival king who wants you dead, how long will you survive? 

Made in 2 days for the Bonejam by Boopworks:

Boopdoop - Programming/Art/Design/Sound

Niko - Programming/Music

Brub - Support
